content.name: Better Scan Colors
content.description: Changes scan colors of station modules to be more distinguishable so that you can see what you have scanned and what not.
content.author: FlynTie

text.name: Better Scan Colors
text.description: Ändert die Scanfarben der Stationsmodule damit man besser sieht was man noch nicht gescant hat.
text.author: FlynTie
